page.title: 16Village Facilities
page.content: {Village Hall} The Village Hall is run by a committee. It can be hired for private functions like wedding receptions and is used by many organisations {Playing Field} This has been recently bought by the village from a local farmer who used to rent it out.The playing field committee organise the maintenance and provision of play equipment for the children {Public House} There is just one pub in the village called "The Case Is Altered".The customers have in the past organised fund raising for various charities and have performed pantomimes at Christmas time
